entrance_hall.name: The Entrance Hall
entrance_hall.description: You stand in a grand entrance hall with vaulted ceilings. Torches flicker on the stone walls, casting dancing shadows. A large wooden door stands to the north, while passages lead east and west.

west.unlockMessage: You insert the brass key and hear a satisfying click. The door to the library swings open.

objects.name: wooden chest
objects.description: An old wooden chest sits in the corner, covered in dust.

open.message: You open the wooden chest with a creak. Inside, you find a brass key!

grand_chamber.name: The Grand Chamber
grand_chamber.description: A magnificent chamber with marble columns reaching toward the ceiling. Ancient tapestries depicting legendary battles line the walls. Exits lead south and east.

throne_room.name: The Throne Room
throne_room.description: An ornate throne room with a massive stone throne at the far end. The throne is empty, but you sense great power once resided here. A passage leads west, and stairs descend to the south.

objects.name: mysterious button
objects.description: A red button is embedded in the arm of the throne.

press.message: You press the button. A hidden compartment opens in the throne, revealing 25 gold coins!

armory.name: The Armory
armory.description: Weapon racks line the walls of this room, though most are empty. A few rusty swords and shields remain. Exits lead west and north.

objects.name: shield rack
objects.description: A rack holding several dusty shields.

touch.message: You touch the shield rack. Nothing happens, but you notice intricate engravings on one of the shields.

library.name: The Ancient Library
library.description: Towering bookshelves filled with dusty tomes surround you. The air smells of old parchment and forgotten knowledge. The only exit is east, back to the entrance hall.

objects.name: ancient tome
objects.description: A large leather-bound book sits on a reading pedestal.

open.message: You carefully open the ancient tome. The pages contain cryptic writings about a hidden treasure vault beneath the throne room.

read.message: The text speaks of great riches hidden below, accessible only from the throne room.

treasure_vault.name: The Treasure Vault
treasure_vault.description: You've discovered the legendary treasure vault! Piles of gold coins glitter in the torchlight. The only exit is up, back to the throne room.
